backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, tournaments, wallet balances, and authorization checks with persistent maps and query/update methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to frontend files, components, and requirements with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining a custom OKLCH color theme with light and dark mode variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, handles authentication state, and displays the main layout with conditional profile setup modal.
Sign-in/sign-out button handling Internet Identity authentication with error recovery and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/PrincipalBa: Shows the user’s principal in shortened form with a copy-to-clipboard button.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users to enter display name and Free Fire UID, saving via profile mutation.
frontend/src/components/common/ErrorNoti: Displays backend errors with user-friendly replacements for common tournament and profile issues.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main layout with navigation, user info, and responsive header, using queries for profile and balance.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identities, and exposing identity status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps common backend queries and mutations for user profile, wallet balance, tournaments, and joining actions.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, query client, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page prompting login and showcasing feature cards with a styled hero section.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Renders a user profile form allowing display name and Free Fire UID updates with loading, error, and success states.
frontend/src/pages/TournamentDetailsPage: Displays detailed tournament info and handles joining logic, including eligibility checks, balance validation, and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/TournamentsPage.tsx: Lists active tournaments with status, entry fee, and basic info, including loading skeletons and navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/WalletPage.tsx: Shows the user's wallet balance, a demo top‑up section, and placeholder transaction history, requiring sign‑in to view.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and layout settings for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines overall project state including versioning, image requirements, implemented features, and pending feature requests for a Free Fire tournament app. Serves as the central configuration and progress record for the build.
